name: Notion Template: Meaningful Project Management
description: Maybe things sometimes feel like they're growing over your head and you don't even start because you don't know where to. Or you want to become more productive, or free your mind from planning and organization half of the day? Try out this template! For MEANINGFUL Project Management.This template allows you to schedule all the things you work on, learn, create, accomplish. I came up with a whole system to tag and sort these in order to stay on top of things and understand why you're doing what,
